en.hero_text: Stop stacking extra Discord bots. The Bros24 Whiteout Survival bot unites Events, Boosts, Heroes, Calculators, Welcome & Ranking in one multilingual assistant â€” built by players for players.
en.hero_badge: By players, for players â€” Whiteout Survival
en.usp1_text: Event Center, Boost tracking, Hero Hub, Calculators, Welcome & Ranking â€” everything in one bot.
en.usp2_text: Less setup, less clutter. One clean, modern menu flow for everyone.
en.usp3_text: You shape the bot with your requests. Community feedback ships weekly.
en.features_sub: Everything your alliance needs â€” in one place.
en.feature_event_text: Create reminders (title, message, images, thumbnails, custom footer). Schedules: daily / 48h / weekly / bi-weekly / every 4 weeks / custom. Target channels, @everyone, roles or members. Edit & delete via menu.
en.feature_hero_text: Hero details, skills, tier lists, building strategies and advanced mechanics.
en.feature_calc_text: Furnace & resource planning, chief gear & charm math, island guide, ranking & welcome, plus minigames.
en.coming_text: New features for Bros24 are on the way â€” crafted for alliances, smarter coordination and more fun in Whiteout Survival. Got ideas? Tell us!
en.upcoming_b1: ğŸ“£ Event Office 2.0 â€” smarter reminders (UTC), weekly cycles, fewer duplicates

en.menu_update_b2: Multilingual (EN, DE, FR, IT, PL, TH).
en.event_update_text: Create events with titles, messages, images, thumbnails, and custom footers. Schedule daily, every 48h, weekly, bi-weekly, every 4 weeks, or custom intervals. Target channels, @everyone, roles, or members. Edit & delete via menu.

en.gift_update_title: ğŸ Gift Code Center â€” New
en.birthday_update_b1: Signup panel with â€œAdd/Update birthdayâ€ & â€œRemove my entryâ€ (restart-safe).
en.birthday_update_b3: Clean setup wizard: channels, texts, image & optional footer.
en.rally_update_b1: Exact UTC scheduling â€” rallies start to the second.
en.rally_update_b2: Automatic pings for all rally participants.
en.rally_update_b3: Pet & buff integration for optimized planning.
en.topgg_text: Vote for the bot, add it to your server, and discover our Whiteout Survival State 214 community.
en.support_highlight_text: Bros24 stays free for everyone. If the bot helps you and you'd like to support server costs & development, you can leave a tip via Buy Me a Coffee. Thank you! â¤ï¸

en.support_b2: ğŸš€ Helps cover hosting, monitoring & weekly updates
en.support_b3: ğŸ¤ Direct & transparent â€” one click
en.community_title: Join the â„ Whiteout Survival | DOA 214 Community
en.community_sub: Events, guides, alliance tools & more â€” be part of it.
en.community_p1: Do you play Whiteout Survival and want to get betterâ€”faster? Ever wondered how top states plan Bear Trap, Frostfire Mine, or squeeze every drop from SVS? Youâ€™re in the right place.
en.community_p2: Weâ€™re DOAâ€™s community from State 214, open to every state and alliance. Join for teamwork, practical guides, and quick help â€” from beginners to min-max pros.
en.community_p3: New to the game? Weâ€™ll guide your first weeks: what to build, research pacing, which heroes & pets to focus, daily routines, and best F2P value.
en.community_p4: Already experienced? Dive into meta chats, comps, damage math, sheets, and high-level planning for Castle/Strongholds, Frost Dragon Tyrant, and cross-state play.
en.community_p5: Never miss rewards: custom bots run smart timers, rally planners, and reminders â€” organized, not spammy.
en.community_p6: Effortless communication with language channels for each community. Post in your language and get help fast.
en.community_p7: Leaders & creators welcome. Share strategies, coordinate cross-state projects, recruit respectfully, and keep it fair-play.
en.community_p8: Jump in, say hello in #arrival, tell us your state and language, and weâ€™ll unlock the right channels. If you like it, please â­ vote on top.gg!

it.community_p3: Nuovo nel gioco? Ti guidiamo nelle prime settimane: cosa costruire, ritmo delle ricerche, eroi/pet su cui puntare, routine giornaliere e valore F2P.
it.community_p4: GiÃ  esperto? Meta, composizioni, matematica del danno, fogli e planning avanzato per Castle/Strongholds, Frost Dragon Tyrant e cross-state.
